name: Utterly Personal
description: An online retailer of personalised gifts
overview:
Utterly Personal is a market leader offering a fantastic range of personalised gifts for special occasions.

Utterly Personal is the brainchild of Roy Dovaston whose objective is to provide innovative, exciting gift ideas coupled with superb customer service that can be purchased through a safe and secure online checkout process.

For too long people have been receiving duplicate gifts or even worse; boring gifts. Utterly Personal are set to put a stop to this by offering only gifts that bear personal messages.
